title: Can't Log In To League
body: So, yesterday I was able to log into the client no problem. And for whatever reason, I can't log in today. I checked the server status for my ISP and for the OCE server on League and both are fine. I followed most of the steps of the suggested support page and no avail. The only thing I didn't touch is my DNS settings but I don't think I need to since it's not a patching issue. What should I do? I also ran the Hextech Repair Tool if that helps.

replies.body:
I am logged in now on NA.
Thanks whoever flipped the power back on! ;)

Edit: I am logged in but none of the content is showing up. Not going to try to play. They are probably working on whatever the issue is/was.
Having the same problem. Everything checks out on my end. Have checked everything in the TS guide, but still have the same issue.
Maybe there are server issues going on, just none we don't know about. I'm kinda relieved I'm not the only one. I really don't want to reinstall or force a patch via the repair tool.

> [{quoted}](name=Evil Kermit 1,realm=OCE,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=toMThIT5,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2017-05-09T07:38:03.832+0000)
>
> Maybe there are server issues going on, just none we don't know about. I'm kinda relieved I'm not the only one. I really don't want to reinstall or force a patch via the repair tool.

I was about to do the repair, but thought better of it. It's obviously not our fault, even though it is ALWAYS the user's fault. lol

> [{quoted}](name=a stinky rat,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=toMThIT5,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-05-09T07:36:08.547+0000)
>
> Having the same problem. Everything checks out on my end. Have checked everything in the TS guide, but still have the same issue.

I'm in the same boat as well. Went through all the recommended checks/fixes from the guide, and its a no-go. I've been unable to login for several days now....
Same as above. Only happens whenever I have all the time in the world.
Same problem here but on EUW...
I cant connect still. Cant connect to login queue. plz tell me if there is a fix

OCE region is currently down for maintenance, so you won't be able to login or get into a game until everything's back up.  Updates will be posted on the [service status site](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#oce).  Hang tight!
i cant launch lol why?can riot help me pleaze?and tell mehas problem 0xcoooo12f

I did everything I could to make it work except changing my DNS. By everything I mean fiddling with: firewall, antivirus, run as admin, tweaking settings in client and for IE and internet protocols. It's not on our end.
can login in EUW now, but ranked games are unavaiable now :/
had same issue as everyone else and logged in and as we was banning for rank we got kicked and rank option is gone so announcement soon i guess
Yeah I can log in now

Nope, supposed to be playing with my friend right now but can't get in.

EDIT: Seems to have been a minor hiccup. I'm in now.

Having the same problem.
"Unable to connect to the login queue. Check the server status here. If it looks good, follow the guide here."

Logged in fine yesterday. Server status is good.
Yeah, I even ran the Hextech Repair Tool as an admin just then, restarting my client now.
